segments.text: Hi Jackie . You don't look too well . What's going on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's nothing . I'm just a little stressed out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: School . Since I was working part time , I had a difficult time keeping up with class . Now that we have exams coming up , I'm totally freaking out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The best thing to do is study as much as you can . I'm sure you'll do alright .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so . I guess I won't be sleeping for the next 3 days . That's what it'll take .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to study for an exam too . Why don't we study together . We can encourage each other .
segments.speaker: S1
